title: Trump won't testify in E. Jean Carroll trial after judge's deadline passes
description: Donald Trump will not testify in E. Jean Carroll's defamation and battery case against him, after a Sunday deadline passed without him filing a motion to reopen the case.

title: Delta flight diverted to Boston due to 'unruly' passenger
description: Delta Air Lines says a flight between Detroit and Amsterdam landed in Boston where an unruly passenger was removed from the airplane

title: Man killed, 2 women hurt in Miami Beach nightclub shooting
description: Police say a man was killed and two women were wounded in a shooting at a Miami Beach nightclub

title: WATCH:  'Flower moon' slowly rises over Australia in timelapse footage
description: Timelapse footage captures the “Flower Moon” slowly rising over Australia’s Byron Bay and the town’s Cape Byron Lighthouse.

title: Man charged in 1988 Michigan slaying dies in SC jail
description: Authorities say a man who was arrested last month in the 1988 stabbing and strangulation of a Michigan woman has died in a South Carolina jail, where he was awaiting extradition to face a murder charge

title: Nick Gilbert, son of Cavaliers owner, dies at 26
description: Nicolas “Nick” Gilbert, the son of Cleveland Cavaliers owner Dan Gilbert who became the team’s good luck charm at NBA draft lotteries, has died

title: 7 dead after car runs into pedestrians, alleged driver arrested
description: Seven people are dead in Brownsville, Texas, after a car ran into pedestrians Sunday morning.

title: Vida Blue, led Oakland to 3 World Series titles, dies at 73
description: The hard-throwing left-hander was one of baseball’s biggest draws in 1970s.

title: Arrest made in Mississippi shooting that killed 1, injured 6
description: Police in Mississippi say a suspect has been arrested in a shooting that left one person dead and six others injured at a restaurant during a Cinco de Mayo party

title: Recordings reveal DeSantis' 2018 thoughts on dealing with Trump
description: Footage obtained by ABC News of Gov. Ron DeSantis' 2018 debate prep provide a glimpse into how he worked to appeal to Donald Trump's base while carving out his own lane.

title: Nuclear watchdog growingly worried over Ukraine plant safety
description: The head of the United Nations’ nuclear watchdog is expressing growing anxiety about the safety of the Zaporizhzhia Nuclear Power Plant
